HediffDef.label: stinger technique
HediffDef.description: Knowledge of the Stinger technique - a lightning-fast dash attack. This combat skill allows the user to instantly close distance and strike with devastating precision.

HediffDef.label: judgement cut technique
HediffDef.description: Mastery of the Judgement Cut - a ranged dimensional slash. This advanced combat technique allows the user to cut through space itself, striking distant enemies with phantom blades.
